Panel on Commercial Opportunities for Python

The panelists were:

  • Al Vezza
    Vice President
    CNRI
    Reston, VA

  • Jim Fulton
    Senior Programmer
    Digital Creations
    Fredricksburg, VA

  • Mark Lutz
    Python Writer/Trainer
    Boulder, CO

  • Robin Friedrich
    Representing Python Professional Sercives, Inc.

  • Jody Winston
    Representing Halliburton Energy Services, Inc.

  • Christian Tismer
    Applied Biometrics, Inc.

  • Dr. Chris Wright
    Deputy Director, ICU
    Director, Medical Informatics
    Monash Medical Centre, CLAYTON, VIC. Australia
    (unfortunately Dr. Wright couldn't make it at the last moment)

    If you're interested in contributing a summary of the panel discussion, please send email to the program committee chairs at ipc6@python.org.
